question: What will be the price of SUI (in USD) on December 10, 2025 at 23:00 UTC?
description:
Predict the price of Sui (SUI) cryptocurrency at the specified resolution time. The market uses real-time price data from CoinGecko.

Current SUI price: ~$1.73 USD

This market offers a balanced range from $1.50 to $2.00, covering the likely short-term price movement of SUI. Each bucket represents a $0.05 price range.
resolutionCriteria:
This market resolves using the Sui (SUI/USD) price reported by CoinGecko at 23:00:00 UTC on December 10, 2025.

The final price will be scaled to 2 decimal places (cents) for settlement.
Only the CoinGecko API will be used as the data source.
In case of any downtime, the last available price before resolution will be used.
Market range: $1.50 - $2.00
